biotools.summary:
SyntDB: defining orthologues of human long noncoding RNAs across primates.

SyntDB - the database of human long non-coding RNAs conserved across primates. Comprehensive collection of long noncoding RNAs (lncRNAs) and their evolutionary relationships in twelve primate species, including human
